PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-00202013-01-31,  ,  ,  ,  ,  CH
ActCanada Travelling Exhibitions Indemnification Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Travelling Exhibitions Indemnification Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA TRAVELLING EXHIBITIONS INDEMNIFICATION REGULATIONS in order to maintain an indemnification scheme that is transparent, can be applied consistently among all eligible exhibitions, and minimizes the Crown’s exposure to risk.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0011 Publication Date: 2013-02-13
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Travelling Exhibitions Indemnification Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADA TRAVELLING EXHIBITIONS INDEMNIFICATION REGULATIONS in order to maintain an indemnification scheme that is transparent, can be applied consistently among all eligible exhibitions, and minimizes the Crown’s exposure to risk.
